summary.span: 表示由解码器返回并被编码器接受的图像数据。

span.span: Represents image data returned by a decoder and accepted by encoders.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过提供对与图像的 特定帧关联的的访问权限，提供未定义的附加功能 。 provides additional functionality not defined by by providing access to the associated with a particular frame of an image. 还支持通过使用属性或方法来写入元数据信息 。 also supports the writing of metadata information by using the property or the method. 从解码器返回的任何都将始终冻结。Any returned from a decoder is always frozen. 如果需要可修改的副本，则必须首先使用方法创建的副本 。If you require a modifiable copy, you must first create a copy of the by using the method. 只有 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] 和 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gif](~/includes/tlasharptla-gif-md.md)] 格式图像支持多个框架。Only [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gif](~/includes/tlasharptla-gif-md.md)] format images support multiple frames. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用创建新 的 。The following code example demonstrates how to create a new by using a . [!code-csharp[bitmapframeexample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitmapFrameExample/CSharp/BitmapFrame.cs#1)] [!code-vb[bitmapframeexample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitmapFrameExample/VB/BitmapFrame.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 对象打开 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] 图形并使用方法编写元数据 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the object to open a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] graphic and write metadata by using the method. [!code-cpp[bitmapmetadata#SetQuery](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitMapMetadata/CPP/BitmapMetadata.cpp#setquery)] [!code-csharp[bitmapmetadata#SetQuery](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitMapMetadata/CSharp/BitmapMetadata.cs#setquery)] [!code-vb[bitmapmetadata#SetQuery](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitMapMetadata/VB/BitmapMetadata.vb#setquery)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `bitmapStream`仅当使用缓存选项时，才能在创建帧后关闭 。The `bitmapStream` can be closed after the frame is created only when the cache option is used. 默认 缓存选项保留流，直到需要帧为止。The default cache option retains the stream until the frame is needed. 使用 方法可指定 create 和 cache 选项。Use the method to specify create and cache options.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果希望在创建位图后关闭，请使用 cache 选项 `bitmapStream` 。Use the cache option if you wish to close the `bitmapStream` after the bitmap is created. 默认 缓存选项保留对流的访问权限，直到需要该位图并由垃圾回收器处理清理。The default cache option retains access to the stream until the bitmap is needed and cleanup is handled by the garbage collector.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果图像文件包含足够的空间用于新的元数据，则只能使用来添加或编辑元数据; 否则，可使用属性来添加元数据 。Metadata can only be added or edited using the if the image file contains enough room for the new metadata; otherwise, metadata can be added using the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 对象打开 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] 图形并使用方法编写元数据 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the object to open a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] graphic and write metadata by using the method. [!code-cpp[bitmapmetadata#SetQuery](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitMapMetadata/CPP/BitmapMetadata.cpp#setquery)] [!code-csharp[bitmapmetadata#SetQuery](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitMapMetadata/CSharp/BitmapMetadata.cs#setquery)] [!code-vb[bitmapmetadata#SetQuery](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitMapMetadata/VB/BitmapMetadata.vb#setquery)]
